subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What is the primary function of ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector?
answer: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector provides nodes to use AnimateDiff-MotionDirector in ComfyUI.

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What command should be used to install the requirements for ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector?
answer: The command to install the requirements for ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector is 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: For what versions of PyTorch has ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector been tested to work?
answer: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector has been tested to work with PyTorch 2.1.1 + cu121 and 2.2.0 + cu121.

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What extension is recommended for using the LoRAs after training with ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector?
answer: After training, the LoRAs are intended to be used with the ComfyUI Extension [ComfyUI-AnimateDiff-Evolved](https://github.com/Kosinkadink/ComfyUI-AnimateDiff-Evolved).

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What is the purpose of the BibTeX references provided in the documentation?
answer: The BibTeX references are for the research articles related to the technology used in ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector: 'AnimateDiff: Animate Your Personalized Text-to-Image Diffusion Models without Specific Tuning' by Guo et al., and 'MotionDirector: Motion Customization of Text-to-Video Diffusion Models' by Zhao et al..

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What is the disclaimer about?
answer: The project is released for academic use and creative usage. It disclaims responsibility for user-generated content and states that users are solely liable for their actions and behaviors.

subject: ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector
question: What projects has the codebase for ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector been built upon?
answer: The codebase for ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector has been built upon various projects including [AnimateDiff-MotionDirector](https://github.com/ExponentialML/AnimateDiff-MotionDirector), [AnimateDiff](https://github.com/guoyww/AnimateDiff), [Tune-a-Video](https://github.com/showlab/Tune-A-Video), [MotionDirector](https://github.com/showlab/MotionDirector), [Text-To-Video-Finetuning](https://github.com/ExponentialML/Text-To-Video-Finetuning), [lora](https://github.com/cloneofsimo/lora), and [ComfyUI](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI).
